title: Slovakia - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Slovakia stands at A+ with negative outlook. Moody's credit rating for Slovakia was last set at A2 with negative outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Slovakia was last reported at A with negative outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Slovakia is A (high) with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Slovakia thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Slovakia as reported by major credit rating agencies.
